name: Management by Strengths
subtitle: Management By Strengths Teambuilder / Customer Relationship
description: Helping you better understand people's differing communication and decision making styles. Over the past 36 years the Management By Strengths (MBS) program has helped companies increase productivity, improve customer satisfaction and employee morale through an improved understanding of how to work more effectively together. Understanding the diversity of temperament helps to improve communication and teamwork with both employees and customers. When you understand an individual's temperament you can communicate and motivate both as a team leader or team player.
descriptionMD: Helping you better understand people's differing communication and decision making styles. Over the past 36 years the Management By Strengths (MBS) program has helped companies increase productivity, improve customer satisfaction and employee morale through an improved understanding of how to work more effectively together. Understanding the diversity of temperament helps to improve communication and teamwork with both employees and customers. When you understand an individual's temperament you can communicate and motivate both as a team leader or team player.

episodes.title: Overview
episodes.description: A look at how the Management by Strengths system will increase productivity, enhance teamwork, open lines of communication, facilitate employee motivation, identify & capitalize upon the key strengths of yourself & anyone you come in contact with, and provide a positive clear direction of management which serves as a common bond for all. We will look at the strengths & temperament traits of the personality which include Directness/Extroversion/Pace and Structure.

episodes.title: Introduction
episodes.description: Mike and Zach give us an overview of how training is applied, working with people, how to be an effective leader, and a history of how we came to be aware of the 4 basic temperaments plus a background of Management by Strengths.

episodes.title: Directness - Red Trait
episodes.description: Mike and Zach give us an overview of how training is applied, working with people, how to be an effective leader, and a history of how we came to be aware of the 4 basic temperaments plus a background of Management by Strengths.

episodes.title: Extroversion - Green Trait
episodes.description: Mike and Zach discuss the temperament characteristics of the Extroversion or Green Trait individual.

episodes.title: Pace - Blue Trait
episodes.description: Mike and Zach discuss the temperament characteristics of the Pace or Blue Trait individual.

episodes.title: Structure - Yellow Trait
episodes.description: Mike and Zach discuss the temperament characteristics of the Structure or Yellow Trait individual.

episodes.title: Create Your Profile Report
episodes.description: Mike and Zach cover where to find the Management by Strengths Profile Report online, how to fill it out, costs for individual/family/enterprise, overview of the 4 temperament traits, and how implementing the Management by Strengths system can benefit anyone anywhere.
